orcs.name: Grishnákh
quotes: Fetch me some fire, I need it to cook the meat.
If we don't hurry, we'll miss the feast.

tools.name: Orc Sword
tools.description: A crude and brutal weapon used by the Orcs.

orcs.background_story: Grishnákh is a formidable leader in Mordor, known for his ruthless command and desire for power. His leadership is crucial in maintaining order among his Orcs.

appearance.description: Grishnákh has a fearsome appearance, with a large, imposing figure and a menacing look that reflects his role as a leader.

orcs.name: Shagrat
quotes: This is the place. Hold tight, or you will fall.
The tower will be ours soon.

tools.name: Orc Sword
tools.description: A heavy sword used by Shagrat.

tools.name: Orc Helm
tools.description: A steel helmet that provides some protection.

orcs.background_story: Shagrat is a fierce captain in the service of Sauron, commanding troops from his stronghold at Cirith Ungol. He is known for his loyalty and combat skills.

appearance.description: Shagrat is equipped with heavy armor and a distinctive helm, giving him a formidable and intimidating appearance.

orcs.name: Uglúk
quotes: We come to kill, not to talk.
I’ll make sure this is the last time you will ever speak.

tools.name: Uruk-hai Sword
tools.description: A stronger and more refined weapon used by Uglúk.

orcs.background_story: Uglúk is a fearsome leader of the Uruk-hai in Isengard, known for his brutal efficiency and loyalty to Saruman. His leadership is critical in the battle against the Free Peoples.

appearance.description: Uglúk's appearance is marked by his imposing size and the distinctive armor of the Uruk-hai, which makes him a terrifying figure on the battlefield.

orcs.name: Azog
quotes: I will crush you like the insect you are.

tools.name: Azog's Great Axe
tools.description: A massive axe wielded by Azog.

orcs.background_story: Azog is a formidable Orc chieftain from Moria, known for his fearsome presence and brutal tactics. His reign of terror extends across the land, instilling fear in his enemies.

appearance.description: Azog is distinguished by his enormous size and the great axe he wields, his appearance is designed to strike fear into the hearts of his foes.

orcs.name: Bolg
quotes: The time of Orcs has come!

tools.name: Bolg's Sword
tools.description: A large, menacing sword used by Bolg.

orcs.background_story: Bolg is a ruthless Orc leader in Moria, known for his aggressive strategies and unyielding nature. His leadership is central to the Orcs' ongoing campaigns.

appearance.description: Bolg is marked by his fearsome, battle-scarred appearance and his large, intimidating sword, reflecting his role as a leader among the Orcs.

orcs.name: Lurtz
quotes: I am Lurtz, leader of the Uruk-hai.
The Shire will be burned to the ground.

tools.name: Uruk-hai Sword
tools.description: A powerful sword wielded by Lurtz.

orcs.background_story: Lurtz is a ruthless leader of the Uruk-hai, known for his brutal efficiency and role in Saruman's plans. His leadership is marked by his ruthlessness and determination.

appearance.description: Lurtz's imposing figure and dark armor make him a fearsome sight, embodying the ferocity and strength of the Uruk-hai.
